title: Pwned Passwords Version 8
description_short: Pwned Passwords is a dataset of 847 million real world passwords previously exposed in data breaches. Released by Have I Been Pwned? in December 2021.
description_long:
Pwned Passwords is a dataset of 847,223,402 real world passwords previously exposed in data breaches. Released by Have I Been Pwned? in December 2021.

More info at haveibeenpwned.com (archived)
View dataset on archive.org
